name: Multigun - Minimalist Game Jam #1
description:
Made for Minimalist Game Jam #1: https://itch.io/jam/minimalist-game-jam-1

Objective: Kill the Boss (largest enemy)

How to play:
Move - WASD/Arrows 
Aim - Mouse
Fire - Mouse Left Click
Reload - Mouse Right Click or R

Changelog
1.0.3 - Added link to Mykaelos twitter.
1.0.2 - Added control instructions to title screen.
1.0.1 - Fixes: enabled windowed mode, and added 'R' as a reload button.
1.0.0 - Minimalist Game Jam Release
